item.description:
(PLEASE NOTE - The organizers in this group are NOT trained leaders or instructors.  The organizers only set the time and place, each person participating in any group trip is responsible for their own safety.  Each participant is responsible for evaluating all relevant conditions for the trip and determining if their skills and equipment are appropriate for those conditions.)

It looks like Wednesday will be a nice day for paddling.  Please arrive in time to start paddling at 1:00 PM.  When you come to Whitehall, be careful with directions. If you use your GPS for directions you will end up at a random spot on a side road. The boat launch is on Route 135 between Hopkinton and Westborough Town Centers. The large parking lot for the boat launch is next to the intersection of Dale Road and Route 135 in Hopkinton.

Plan to spend about 2 hours on the water.
item.name: Paddle Wednesday afternoon at Whitehall
